page.title: 05Law and Order in Aston
page.content: The Aston community policeman's duties are many.P.C Goodge has to prevent fights & arguments,visit schools & houses,talk to people,sort domestic problems,check property,go on the beat when pubs turn out to prevent crime and visit youth clubs.The two policemen who cover this area of Aston,Aughton,Fence,Ulley,Swallownest and Treeton,are responsible for 20,000 people.His uniform consists of: a waterproof coat,jacket numbered 1354,a blue shirt,dark blue trousers with long pockets for a truncheon heavy boots and a belt with a pouch for handcuffs.The following amusing incidents,a full potty being slung at him by a suspected dead lady, apprehending a donkey in a church, arresting a violent youth and capturing a nude man down a man hole, are all part of a days work. A.L
